ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera With 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR Lens + Nikon AF-S DX VR Zoom-Nikkor 55-200mm f/4-5.6G IF-ED Lens + CS Pro Lens Package: Includes 64GB SDHC Memory Card, SD Card Reader, ENEL14 Replacement Battery, High Definition Wide Angle Lens, 2x Telephoto HD Lens, 4 Piece Macro Lens Set, 3 Piece Filter Kit, 2 UV Filters, Tulip Lens Hood, Cap Keeper, Professional Carrying Case, Cleaning Pen, Starters Kit & CS Microfiber Cleaning Cloth
